headline: Is Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) Pricing Reflect Recovery After Recent Cruise Demand Headlines
summary: If you are wondering whether Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings is good value at around US$23.09, the key question is how its current share price lines up with what the business might reasonably be worth. The stock has had mixed returns, with a 6.7% gain over the last 30 days and a 48.7% return over 3 years, set against a 1.4% gain year to date and an 11.3% decline over the past year. Recent headlines around cruise demand, pricing, and balance sheet resilience have kept Norwegian Cruise Line...

headline: NORWEGIAN CRUISE LINE® OPENS FOR SALE ITS LARGEST AND MOST ILLUMINATING SHIP - THE ALL-NEW NORWEGIAN AURA™
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCL), the innovator in global cruise travel, today unveiled and opened for sale Norwegian Aura™, the longest and largest vessel in its fleet, which will homeport in Miami beginning in June 2027 following her debut in Europe in late May 2027.

content.title: NORWEGIAN CRUISE LINE® OPENS FOR SALE ITS LARGEST AND MOST ILLUMINATING SHIP - THE ALL-NEW NORWEGIAN AURA™
content.summary: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCL), the innovator in global cruise travel, today unveiled and opened for sale Norwegian Aura™, the longest and largest vessel in its fleet, which will homeport in Miami beginning in June 2027 following her debut in Europe in late May 2027.

thumbnail.caption: Featuring a design 10% larger than its predecessors, Norwegian Aqua® and Norwegian Luna™, Norwegian Aura™ sets a new standard in size and scale for the NCL fleet and was designed to deliver curated experiences forfamilies and guests of all ages.
